Past members

Yoon Eun O

Introduction

VROMANCE is a three-member male vocal group under RBW. Originally four, they officially debuted on July 12, 2016, with the mini album "The Action".

After eight years, the members decided to wrap up their time as a group, officially declaring their disbandment on September 19, 2024.

Current state:
